title: Fragment, 1st part 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: stenciled and brushed decoration on tabby wtih twill-effect ground pattern
dimensions: H x W: 39 x 33 cm (15 3/8 in. x 13 in.)
description: Soft sky-blue tabby with ground pattern of flowering plants in twill-effect. Stenciled flowering sprays and butterflies in black and  gray overlay this. One narrow coarse tabby selvage. Butterfly printed and painted. Flowers printed.
